summary: Build a scheduler-style page (inspired by Chewy Vet Care scheduler) where, after selecting a groomer, the user sees a list of that groomer’s available services.
architectural_notes: Use https://www.chewy.com/vet-care/scheduler as a UX/context reference for the scheduler flow.

existing_features.title: Create a scheduler-style UI flow (inspired by https://www.chewy.com/vet-care/scheduler) where the user can select a groomer and then view a list of services offered by that selected groomer.
Connect the groomer/services UI to the backend using React Query, including loading and error states for fetching groomers and services.

Apply a coherent, polished visual theme for the scheduler flow (colors, typography, spacing, and components) that feels modern and pet-care adjacent, and keep it consistent across the groomer selection and services list steps (do not use blue/purple as primary colors).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a page that lists a selected groomer’s available services (using Chewy scheduler as UX reference).
Implement backend data and APIs to provide (1) the list of groomers and (2) the list of services for a given groomer, so the frontend can render real data rather than hardcoded UI-only state.
